attributes.action: Force Swansea University to change the name of the union night club back to Divas and bring back the stage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has always been called Divas and should continue to be called it. It is our night club and we the students don't like what is being done to it. The stage was the feature that made Divas what it is and we want it back!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
